title: The Favorites - Early Super Bowl LVI Gambling Preview
itunes:title: The Favorites - Early Super Bowl LVI Gambling Preview
description:
The dust has settled, and the Rams head back to Los Angeles to face the most unlikely Super Bowl contender in a generation. Together the Action Network's Chad Millman and professional sports bettor Simon Hunter break down what they saw in the Conference Championship games, where they disagreed, and how this informs how their initial bets on Super Bowl LVI.

Plus, they track the early line movements on the games and discuss how big professional bets have already impacted the line and total. Later this week, we'll bring on the infamous Stuckey from the Action Network Podcast to provide more betting news and trends to know for this Super Bowl matchups, before we move on next week to special prop betting and Best Bets episodes. So strap in and keep it right here on The Favorites for all your Super Bowl gambling content needs!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
